Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 4 -- 20 Mills - BOC - 30 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 4 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 4 of the Parish of Natchitoches, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy and collect an ad valorem tax of twenty (20.00) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $225,760 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of thirty (30) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2046, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in the District, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
